backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining website content, user profiles, and access‑controlled profile endpoints, with publicly updateable website content.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, impacted frontend files, related components, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, hooks, utilities, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with warm color variables for light and dark modes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, favicon, dark mode root class, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling content loading, layout rendering, profile setup gating, and the always-accessible editor dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Error screen displaying a generic failure message for loading the editor without admin-specific logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminEdito: Public website editor dialog with tabs, form fields, live preview, and anonymous content update mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ChangeEdit: Placeholder or empty file intended for an admin‑only edit‑password dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button managing auth flow, state, and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without profiles to enter their name, with save and error handling.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Heade: Responsive site header with desktop and mobile navigation, scroll-to-section behavior, login button, and an editor launch action.
frontend/src/components/sections/Content: Renders a content section with a title, body text, and three feature cards highlighting key product qualities.
Displays footer text, a powered-by link with app tracking, and a copyright line using the current year.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero layout with configurable text and image alignment, optional preview mode, and a scroll-to-content button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Legacy hook exposing admin and authentication status based on Internet Identity and an admin-check query.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonymousActor.ts: Provides a cached anonymous backend actor instance via react-query with infinite lifetime.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonymousWebsiteCo: Fetches and updates website content using the anonymous actor, invalidating cached content on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth flow, storing and restoring identities and exposing login, logout, and status state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of hooks for fetching and mutating website content, user profiles, roles, and admin status using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/utils/heroLayout.ts: Provides helpers that map alignment and position data to Tailwind CSS utility classes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors tied to CSS variables, plugins, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking admin-removal feature work, known issues, and pending feature requests.
